name: SendPress For WooCommerce
author: Jared Harbour (BrewLabs)

sections.description:
SendPress is a newsletter plugin for WordPress that allows to create and send newsletters. With SendPress for WooCommerce you can collect subscribers right from your store. This plugin requires both SendPress and WooCommerce.

Features of the SendPress include:

  • Simple editor. With an html-free experience
  • Easy to use theme styler with ability to create a default style
  • Stat tracking for each email: clicks, opens and unsubscribes. Bounce handling and report details with SendPress Pro.
  • Add a subscription form as a sidebar widget or in your pages
  • Send with your web host or Gmail for free (Mandrill, Sendgrid, Amazon SES and more with PRO).
  • Scheduled Sending of emails
  • Sync Lists to WordPress Roles

More information at SendPress.com.

Support

Please check out our support site http://sendpress.com/support/knowledgebase/ if you need help with anything. Also feel free to post to the WordPress support forum.

Follow this plugin on Git Hub
sections.installation:
Right within WordPress

  1. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  2. Search for SendPress For WooCommerce
  3. Click to install
  4. Activate the plugin

Uploading a zip file

  1. Download the plugin (.zip file) on the right column of this page
  2. In your Admin, go to menu Plugins > Add
  3. Select the tab “Upload”
  4. Upload the .zip file you just downloaded
  5. Activate the plugin

Good old FTP

  1. Upload woocommerce-sendpress folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Getting a 404 error?

To get rid of the 404 error when viewing an email, you need to resave your permalink structure. Go to Settings > Permalinks and click “Save Changes”.

How do I test Beta releases?

We only recommend you do this only in a test enviroment. You can get the SendPress Beta Tester Plugin from GitHub. This will pull the most recent code from github using the WordPress updater.

How do you contact us?

Main Site: http://sendpress.com

Twitter: @sendpress
sections.changelog:
Previous releases can be downloaded from GitHub

1.0 – 2015.3.2

  • First release to WP.org
